dict.string: ClearVue needs to verify your Face ID hardware is working correctly.
ClearVue needs camera access to test the front and rear cameras.
ClearVue needs microphone access to test audio recording.
ClearVue needs Bluetooth access to verify the Bluetooth radio is functioning.
ClearVue needs location access to verify GPS hardware.
ClearVue needs motion sensor access to test the accelerometer and gyroscope.
